custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT news.* FROM News_News news JOIN News_NewsPopulation pop ON news.newsId = pop.newsId LEFT JOIN News_NewsRead newsread ON news.newsId = newsread.newsId AND newsread.userId = ? WHERE (news.publicationDate < ? OR news.authorId = ?) AND ((pop.groupId IN ([$GROUP_IDS$]) AND pop.roleId IN ([$ROLE_IDS$]) AND news.expirationDate > ?) OR news.authorId = ?) [$OTHER$] GROUP BY news.newsId ORDER BY news.publicationDate DESC LIMIT ?

WHERE news.publicationDate < ? AND ((pop.groupId IN ([$GROUP_IDS$]) AND pop.roleId IN ([$ROLE_IDS$]) AND news.expirationDate > ?) OR news.authorId = ?) [$OTHER$]
